record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON CALENDAR--S. 287

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S. 287 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.narrative: The clerk will state the bill by title.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to the bill.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
